course_title: Advanced Writing of Drama for Screen I - ADV DRAM SCRN I

sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will run as a text-based asynchronous workshop on Canvas Wednesday 9AM-Thursday 12 Noon with a synchronous screenplay reading component on Collaborate Ultra on some Wednesdays from 3-4PM PST. Screenplay readings will be recorded for students who cannot attend in real time.
